commands.cmd: wsl pandoc content/*.md --toc --include-in-header header.tex -N --template eisvogel.tex -s --from markdown --highlight-style tango --variable urlcolor=cyan -o Manual.pdf ; wsl rm ../Assets/WIMVR/Manual.pdf ; wsl rm ../Assets/WIMVR/Manual.pdf.meta ; cp Manual.pdf ../Assets/WIMVR/Manual.pdf
